price: Dijo: "¿No te había dicho que no tendrías paciencia conmigo?"
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
